title: Solomon’s Wealth and Wisdom
summary: The Queen of Sheba visits Solomon and is amazed by his wisdom and wealth. The chapter lists Solomon’s riches and achievements before noting his death and the beginning of Rehoboam’s reign.

faq.question: Why did the Queen of Sheba visit Solomon?
faq.answer: To test his wisdom with hard questions and see his kingdom for herself.

faq.question: How did Solomon’s reign end?
faq.answer: He died after ruling for 40 years and was succeeded by his son Rehoboam.
